issue.title: [CF 877] Reset Group Opacity when Splitting Into New Group
issue.body:
Because sometimes when you do this, it takes you a while to figure out why your icon isn't showing, until you realize it inherits group opacity and then you feel silly.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #877 | Raw

comments.body:
Oh and I'm quite fond of these new global groups in the alpha version. Will be very nicely to never have to reimport certain groups every time I change them to an alt because his version doesn't have an updated raid notification aura or something.

E: HOLY SHIT I CAN MOVE GROUPS TO GLOBAL OR NOT ON A WHIM I WAS GOING TO MAKE A TICKET AT FIRST

Edited Oct 16, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo
